Description of incident: Rob Kirby CPA notified customers of a data breach when the car he was driving was broken into and his briefcase, a password protected laptop and flash drive containing confidential client information was stolen.The information stolen included tax returns for current and previous years, copies of supporting documents associated with the returns, including names, addresses, birth dates, and Social Security numbers for clients, spouses, and dependents.More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-47844
